medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptom onset began the evening prior to admission with a stomachache. The patient awoke feeling nauseated yesterday and experienced a few episodes of non-bilious emesis. The pain was initially diffuse but migrated to the lower abdomen, described as crampy in nature. The pain rating decreased after receiving IV morphine.
medical_history.family_history: Father with alcoholism. Mother with DM.
